resetConfirm: Are you sure? This will reset ALL settings including the URL.
resetConfirmDescription: This will reset all settings for preset "{name}". Are you sure?
backgroundSectionDescription: You can add a media URL (video/image) for the background or use only a background color. You can adjust media and overlay position settings in real-time from the preview areas below.
colorPickerTooltip: This selection determines your background color.
colorPickerDescription: Select a solid color for your LCD screen background. The color will be displayed when no media URL is set.
overlayOptionsDescription: Settings take effect immediately. Use the plus button to add sensors, text, and other elements.
resetElementsConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all element values to their default settings? This action cannot be undone.
removeElementConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this element? This action cannot be undone.
mockDataWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Running in browser mode. NZXT CAM API is not available. Displayed values are mock data and do not reflect actual system metrics.
resolvingUrl: Please wait, URL is being resolved...
urlResolveError: Failed to resolve URL. Please check the URL or try again later.
urlResolveTimeout: URL resolution timed out. Please try again.
youtubeNotSupportedMessage:
YouTube links are not supported yet.

Please use a direct .mp4 / .jpg / .gif URL.

(Experimental Pinterest URLs are accepted.)
youtubeInfoMessage:

noElements: No elements added yet. Use the buttons above to add metrics or text.
tooltipSensor: Select which system metric to display
tooltipSize: Font size for the displayed value
presetImportError: Failed to import preset file. Please check the file format.
presetImportValidationErrors: Preset validation failed. Please check the file.
presetImportWarnings: Preset imported with warnings. Some values were adjusted.
presetImportNormalized: Some preset values were normalized to valid ranges.
favoriteLimitMessage: You can only favorite up to 10 presets.
presetListEmpty: No presets yet. Export your current settings to create one.
presetDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
presetConflictMessage: A preset named "{name}" already exists. What would you like to do?
clearAllOverlayElementsConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all overlay elements? This action cannot be undone.
overlayImportModalDescription: Choose how to import overlay elements:
overlayMaxElementsWarning: Maximum {max} overlay elements allowed. Cannot add {count} more element(s).
overlayExportError: Failed to export overlay preset. Please try again.
overlayFooterDescription: Export or import overlay element configurations as preset files.
localMediaDescription: Choose an image or video file from your computer to use as the background for this preset.
localMediaSupportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, MP4. Max size: 150 MB.
localMediaFileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum supported size is 150 MB.
localMediaUnsupportedType: Unsupported file type. Allowed: JPG, PNG, GIF, MP4.
localMediaSaveFailed: Failed to save local media. Please try again.
localMediaNotFound: Local media not found. Please reselect the file using Browse.
localMediaImportWarning: This preset uses a local media file. Please reselect the file using Browse.
localMediaExportWarning: This preset uses a local media file. The media itself is not included in this export.
tooltipClockMode: Time mode: 24h (24-hour format) or 12h (12-hour format with AM/PM)
tooltipDateFormat: Date format string. Examples: YYYY/MM/DD, DD.MM.YYYY, DD MMM YYYY, MMMM DD YYYY, YY-MM-DD, YYYYÂπ¥MMÊúàDDÊó•. Use YYYY/YY for year, MM/M for month, DD/D for day, MMM/MMMM for month name.
alertNoElementsToExport: No overlay elements to export. Add some elements first.
alertNoActivePreset: No active preset selected. Please select a preset first.
alertCannotAppendOverlayElements: Cannot append overlay elements. Current runtime count is {currentCount}/{max}. Adding {count} elements would exceed the limit of {max}.
